description:
Gohan begins his first day of Piccolo’s training.  Alone in the wilderness, he must quickly learn to take care of himself.  But that isn’t easy when he’s tired, hungry - and being chased by bloodthirsty dinosaurs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: É preciso sobreviver aos dinossauros! O difícil treinamento de Gohan
Kyouryuu to Survival! Gohan no Tsurai Shugyou
ห้องเรียนสุดโหดของโกฮัง เอาตัวรอดจากไดโนเสาร์
恐竜とサバイバル! 悟飯のツライ修行
